name: Rocket Science (breadidentevil)
description: You are Sergeant Decoy and your planet, Stivona is on the brink of starvation. You have been assigned to a trip to the recently discovered planet 'Elvaria', where you shall collect anything edible. On the trip there, you signalling malfunctions and sends you into an another planet's asteroid belt. Guide Sergeant Decoy and save Stivona from its impending doom.
